tool.name: fs2bkp
tool.displayname: Update Backup of a Feature Service Layer

param.name: from_data
param.dialogReference: The feature service layer. If using the URL, make sure to include the layer's index number.

param.name: to_data
param.displayname: Backup Feature Service Layer or Feature Class (to update)
param.dialogReference: Existing feature class backup. Must already exist (can use Feature Service Layers to Feature Classes to create the local copy).

param.name: created_date_field
param.dialogReference: Field in the feature service that indicates when the feature was created. Used to identify 'new' data in the service, which will be downloaded and appended to the backup.

tool.summary: Maintains a local feature class backup of a feature service layer. This tool compares an existing local backup of a service layer to a feature service layer. It requires that the service layer has a date created field, which is used to identify new data to append to the local backup. If you don't already have a local backup, you can use Feature Service Layers to Feature Classes to create it.

idCitation.resTitle: Update Backup of a Feature Service Layer
